    • com.example.zoomwroom中DriveRequest的使用

      返回DriveRequest的com.example.zoomwroom中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      DriveRequest RequestAdapter.getRequestAtPosition(int position)
      This methods finds the request by index
      参数类型为DriveRequest的com.example.zoomwroom中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void FragmentCreateRide.acceptedPhase(DriveRequest _request)
      Have the driver's name, username and confirm button appear Override confirm button to update the drive request Driver's username is also now clickable to view
      void RiderHomeActivity.completeRideFragment(RiderCompleteRequestFragment fragment, DriveRequest request)
      This method is called when the status is set to COMPLETE Display the complete fragment on rider side
      void FragmentCreateRide.confirmRidePhase(DriveRequest request)
      Called when user wants to accept the ride from driver Confirm button is invisible again
      void FragmentCreateRide.createRequest(DriveRequest request) 
      double DriverHomeActivity.getDistance(DriveRequest request)
      Calculates distance between the destination and pickup location.
      void FragmentCreateRide.pendingPhase(DriveRequest request)
      When the ride request is pending, the confirm button is hidden
      void FragmentCreateRide.ridingPhase(DriveRequest _request)
      Ride is now in progress User is no longer able to cancel the ride Complete the ride button is now active
      void DriverHomeActivity.showDriveRequestFragment(DriveRequest request)
      Bundles required information and passes it to the driveRequestFragment.
      类型变量类型为DriveRequest的com.example.zoomwroom中的方法参数 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
